translation.Drivers should ensure riders' luggage ad: Abatwara abagenzi bagomba kureba ko imizigo y'abagenzi  yujuje ibisabwa n'amategeko yashyizweho na Leta, harebwa ko ifite inyemezabwishyu aho bikenewe cyangwa se ibindi byangombwa bisabwa.
translation.Car Status and Emergency Kits: Imiterere y'ikinyabiziga n'ibikoresho by'ibanze byifashishwa mu bihe bidasanzwe
translation.Riders should confirm cars are devoid of: Abagenzi bagomba gusuzuma ko ibinyabiziga bitagaragaza ibintu byateza impungege z'umutekano muke, nk'ibibazo bya tekiniki, ibira cyangwa se iyangirika rya bimwe mu bice by'ibinyabiziga, kuba umushoferi agaragaraho ubushobozi bwo gutwara neza, n'ibindi
translation.Essential safety equipment like spare ti: Ibikoresho by'ibanze byifashishwa mu bihe bidasanzwe, nk'ipine y'ingoboka, ijeki, n'ibindi bikoresho nkenerwa bigomba kuba bihari.
translation.Riders must verify the driver's identity: Abagenzi bagomba kureba ko umwirondo w'ugiye kubatwara uhuye n'umwirondoro ugaragazwa ku mbuga zacu.
translation.Drivers should possess all required docu: Abatwara abagenzi bagomba kuba bafite ibyangombwa byose nk'uko amategeko ya Repubulika y'u Rwanda abiteganya.
translation.The absence of police fines hindering th: Mu rwego rwo kwirinda ubukererwe cyangwa se ibibazo mu nzira, utwara abagenzi agomba kwerekana ko nta kirarane cy'ibihano/amande yahawe na Polisi ikinyabiziga cye gifite.
translation.Welcome to 250Ride, the carpooling servi: Ikaze ku rubuga 250Ride, serivisi yo guhuza abagenzi n'ababatwara mugezwaho na 250Ride Ltd, ibanga ku makuru yanyu ni ingenzi kuri twe, kandi twiyemeje kuyarinda. Iyi Politiki Yibanga isobanura uburyo dukusanya, dukoresha, kandi turinda amakuru yawe mugihe ukoresha urubuga rwacu.
translation.When you use our services, we may collec: Mu gihe ukoresha serivisi zacu, dushobora gukusanya amakuru akwerekeye akurikira:
translation.Registration Information: This includes: Amakuru yo kwiyandikisha: Aha hakubiyemo numero ya terefone yawe ngendanwa, amazina, imeri, nibindi bisobanuro byose bisabwa mu gufungura konti.
translation.User Profile Information: Information yo: Umwirondoro w'ukoresha urubuga: Amakuru utanga kubushake, nkamafoto ya konti, amakuru y'ibikuranga, amakuru y'ibyangombwa n'ibiranga ibinyabiziga.
translation.We may use various technologies to autom: Dushobora gukoresha ikoranabuhanga ritandukanye mu gukusanya amakuru igihe cyose usuye cyangwa ukoresheje urubuga rwacu, harimo:
translation.Technical Information: Time, date, and o: Amakuru ya tekiniki: Igihe, itariki, n'andi makuru y'imibare yimikoreshereze yawe ya serivisi zacu.
translation.Location Information: We use geolocation: Amakuru y'ahantu: Dukoresha amakuru y'imenyeshahantu (geolocation) mu guhuza abagenzi n'ababatwara.
translation.Usage Information: Data related to how y: Amakuru ku mikoreshereze y'urubuga: Amakuru ajyanye n'uburyo ukoresha urubuga rwacu.
translation.Call Information: For quality and traini: Amakuru yo guhamagara: Kugira ngo yifashishwe mu kunoza imikorere no guhugura, ibiganiro byabayeho uhamagara usaba kuzigama imyanya y'ingendo (booking) bishobora gufatwa no bikabikwa.
translation.We collect and use the information for t: Dukusanya kandi tugakoresha amakuru ku buryo bukurikira:
translation.Connecting Users: Facilitate carpooling: Guhuza Abakoresha Urubuga: guhuza abagenzi n'ababatwara
translation.Account Management: Create and update us: Gucunga Konti: Kurema no kuvugurura konti z'abakoresha urubuga, gushyiraho uburyo bwo kwishyurana, no kunoza serivisi zigenewe ukoresha urubuga.
translation.Service Improvement: Analyze, improve, a: Gutezimbere Serivisi: Gusesengura, kunoza, no guteza imbere serivisi zacu.
translation.Communication: Send updates, promotions,: Itumanaho: Koherereza abakoresha urubuga amakuru ku mavugurura, poromosiyo, n' andi makuru y'ingenzi.
translation.Customer Support: Provide assistance and: Ubufasha ku bakoresha urubuga: Gutanga ubufasha ku bakoresha serivisi.
translation.Safety and Security: Respond to safety i: Umutekano: Guhangana n'ibibazo by'umutekano, impanuka, amakimbirane, ndetse n'izindi ngamba zishyizweho n'inzego za Leta zibishinzwe.
translation.We may share your information under the: Dushobora gusangiza amakuru yawe mu buryo bukurikira:
translation.With Carpool Drivers: Basic information: Ku batwara abagenzi: Tubasangiza amakuru y'ibanze kugira ngo byoroshye serivisi zitangwa n'urubuga.
translation.With Payment Service Providers: Informat: Ku batanga serivisi z'ikoranabuhanga ryo kwishyurana: Tubasangiza amakuru akenewe kugira ngo serivisi zo kwishyurana zibeho.
translation.For Legal Reasons: Disclosure to governm: Kubw'impamvu zigenwa n'amategeko: Gusangiza no kumenyekanisha amakuru ku nzego za Leta mugihe biteganywa n amategeko.
translation.We take reasonable precautions to secure: Dufata ingamba zikwiriye zituma tubika, ku buryo butekanye, amakuru yakusanyijwe. N'ubwo duharanira kurinda amakuru yawe, ntidushobora kwizeza umutekano usesuye mugihe amakuru yoherezwa.
translation.6. User Control and Account Termination: 6. Kugenzura uko ukoresha Urubuga no gufunga Konti
translation.You can control your account and the inf: Ushobora kugenzura uko ukoresha konte yawe ndetse n'amakuru utanga. Ushobora no gufunga konti yawe igihe ubishatse.
translation.We may retain certain information for di: Dushobora kubika amakuru amwe n'amwe kugira ngo yifashishwe mu gukemura impaka, gukumira uburiganya, no kubahiriza amategeko.
translation.We may update this Privacy Policy to ref: Dushobora kuvugurura iyi Politiki y'Ibanga kugirango igendane n' impinduka zabayeho mu byo dukora. Ivugurura iryo ariryo ryose rihita rigira agaciro igihe rishyizwe ku rubuga rwacu. Turashishikariza abakoresha urubuga kujya basoma iyi politiki kenshi.
translation.If you have any questions or comments ab: Niba ufite ikibazo cyangwa igitekerezo kuri iyi Politiki y'Ibanga, twandikire kuri info@250ride.rw
translation.1. How can I register as a driver on 250: 1. Nigute nshobora kwiyandikisha nk'utwara abagenzi kuri 250 Ride?
translation.To register as a driver, please fill out: Kugira ngo wiyandikishe nk'utwara abagenzi, usabwa kuzuza amakuru y'umwirondoro wawe ndetse n'amakuru ku kinyabiziga uteganya gukoresha, hanyuma ukanaduha ku mbuga zacu ibyangombwa bishimangira ayo makuru watanze.
translation.2. What documents do I need to provide d: 2. Ni ibihe byangombwa nkeneye gutanga mu gihe  niyandikisha?
translation.You need to submit your ID document or p: Usabwa gutanga irangamuntu cyangwa pasiporo, uruhushya rwo gutwara ikinyabiziga, inyandiko iranga imodoka/karite jone, ubwinshingizi bw'imodoka, icyangombwa cya kontorole tekiniki, n'uruhushya rutangwa na RURA mu gihe urufite. Ibyangombwa byose bitanzwe bigomba kuba ari iby'ukuri kandi bitararengeje igihe.
translation.3. How long does the driver registration: 3. Kwemeza utwara abagenzi wiyandikishije bitwara igihe kingana iki?
translation.The driver registration approval process: Utwara abagenzi wiyandikishije, mu gihe yujuje ibisabwa byose ahabwa igisubizo mu gihe kitarenze amasaha 24. Igihe bibaye ngombwa ubuziranenge bw'ibyangombwa byatanzwe bishobora gusuzumwa hifashishijwe inzego z'ubuyobozi za Leta.
translation.4. Can I offer rides only within my city: 4. Ese nshobora gutwara abagenzi mu gace mbwarizwamo gusa cyangwa nshobora no kujya mu bindi bice by'igihugu?
translation.You can offer rides anywhere in Rwanda,: Ushobora gutwara abagenzi aho ariho hose mu Rwanda, kuko serisivi za 250Ride ziboneka mu gihugu hose.
translation.5. How do I set a ride price and how am: 5. Igiciro cy'urugendo ngishyiraho nte kandi nishyuza nte?
translation.You can set your own ride price within t: Igiciro cy'urugendo wowe ubona gikwiriye ucyuzuza ahabugenewe mu gihe ushyiraho gahunda y'urugendo; kwishyurwa bikorwa mbere y'urugendo cyangwa se igihe urugendo rurangiye. Mu gihe kwishyurwa bibayeho mbere y'urugendo hakoreshwa ikoranabuhanga rya MoMo, naho kwishyurwa nyuma y'urugendo bishobora gukorwa hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga cyangwa se umugenzi agatanga kasha/amafaranga.
translation.1. How do I find available rides on 250: 1. Ni gute nabona ingendo nkeneye kuri 250 Ride?
translation.Simply open the app, enter your departur: Kugira ngo urebe niba ingendo wifuza ziboneka kuri 250, fungura apulikasiyo cyangwa urubuga, uzuzamo aho uhagurukira n'aho ujya, igihe wifuza guhagurikira, maze werekwe ingendo zihuye cyangwa se zijya zijya guhura n'izo wifuza. Hitamo izo ihuye neza na gahunda yawe nibyo ukunda.
translation.Payment is made digitally before or upon: Kwishyura bikorwa mbere cyangwa se nyuma y'urugendo. Iyo bikozwe mbere hifashishwa buri gihe ikoranabuhanga rya Mobile Money mu gihe igihe bikozwe nyuma bishobora no gukorwa hifashishijwe kashi/amafaranga.
translation.3. What happens if I need to cancel my r: 3. Bigenda bite iyo nkeneye guhagarika urugendo rwanjye?
translation.You can cancel your ride through the app: Ushobora guhagarika urugendo rwawe ukoresheje apulikasiyo cyangwa se urubuga byacu. Ariko kandi ugomba kumenya icyo amabwiriza agenga guhagarika ingendo aboneka mu Amategeko n'Aamabwiriza abivugaho, kuko bijyanye n'igihe ihagarikwa ryakorewe hari ubwo umugenzi adasubizwa amafaranga yatanze cyangwa se akagira ayo akatwa.
translation.4. Can I schedule rides in advance?: 4. Ese nshobora gushyiraho gahunda y'ingendo mbere y'igihe?
translation.Yes, you can schedule rides in advance t: Yego, ukoresheje ikoranabuhanga rya 250Ride ushobora gushyiraho gahunda y'ingendo mbere y'uko ibihe byo kugenda bigera. Ubu buryo bugufasha gutegura ingendo zawe ndetse no kongera amahirwe yo kubona imodoka igutwara mu rugendo.
translation.5. Is there customer support available i: 5. Haba hari abo namenyesha mu gihe mpuye n'ikibazo ndi mu rugendo?
translation.Yes, 250 Ride provides customer support: Yego, 250 Ride itanga uburyo abakoresha serivisi zayo bashobora kuyimenyesha mu gihe bahuye n'ikibazo kugira ngo gishakirwe igisubizo.  Ushobora kwaka ubufasha unyuze kuri apulikasiyo cyangwa se ku rubuga rwa interineti.
translation.By using the carpooling service provided: Mu gukoresha serivisi ya 250 Ride Ltd, ivugwa nka '250 Ride,' wemeye kugengwa n' aya Mategeko n' Amabwiriza. Mu gihe utabyemera, hagarika gukoresha serivisi zacu.
translation.You must be at least 18 years old to use: Ugomba kuba wujuje nibura imyaka 18 kugirango ukoreshe serivisi zacu. Mu gukoresha serivisi zacu wemeje ko ufite imyaka y'ubukure yemewe.
translation.To access our carpooling services, you a: Kugirango ukoreshe serivisi zacu, usabwa gufunguza konti kuri 250ride utanga amakuru yuzuye kandi y'ukuri. Ni inshingano zawe kubika imibare cyangwa amagambo-banga ya konti yawe.
translation.Users are expected to adhere to the foll: Abantu bakoresha serisivi zacu bose bemera gukurikiza amabwiriza agenga imyitwarire myiza ku mbuga na apulikasiyo byacu mu buryo bukurikira:
translation.- Treat fellow passengers and drivers w: - Ubaha kandi witware neza ku bagenzi bagenzi bawe ndetse n'abatwara abagenzi
translation.- Avoid offensive language, harassment,: - Irinde imvugo zitari nziza, itotezanya, cyangwa se ivangura iryo ariryo ryose.
translation.- Prioritize safety during rides by fol: - Shyira imbere kubungabunga umutekano mu gihe cy'ingendo, ukurikiza amategeko agenga ikoreshwa ry'imihanda ndetse n'andi matekego n'amabwiriza yashyizweho na Leta.
translation.- Report any safety concerns promptly t: - Mu gihe cy'umutekano muke cyangwa ikibazo kiwerekeyeho, tumenyeshe byihuse ukoresheje ikoranabuhanga rya 250Ride kandi unamenyeshe inzego z'umutekano zibishinzwe.
translation.- Be punctual for both pick-up and drop: - Ubahiriza igihe haba ku isaha yo gutangiriraho urugendo, mu gihe cy'urugendo, ndetse no ku isaha iteganyijwe yo kurangirizaho urugendo.
translation.- Notify other users and 250 Ride in ad: - Menyesha ku gihe abo mufitanye gahunda y'urugendo ndetse unamenyeshe 250Ride mu gihe habaye impinduka ku rugendo rwari rwateganyijwe.
translation.- Communicate clearly and respectfully: - Vugana neza n'umugenzi cyangwa se utwara abagenzi mu bwubahane, muhane amakuru akenewe kugira ngo mubashe gukora urugendo.
translation.- Use in-app communication features for: - Koresha uburyo bw'itumanaho riboneka mu ikoranabuhanga rya 250Ride mu gihe uganira ibyerekeranye n'urugendo.
translation.- Ensure your luggage complies with loc: - Suzuma neza ko imizigo yujuje ibisabwa n' amategeko n'amabwiriza byashyizweho n'inzego za Leta.
translation.- Do not carry any unlawful items, haza: - Birabujijwe gutwara ibintu binyuranyije n'amategeko, ibintu ibishobora guteza akaga, cyangwa se ibintu bibujijwe n amategeko.
translation.- Carry valid personal identification a: - Itwaze ibyangombwa byemewe bikuranga nk'uko biteganywa n'amategeko.
translation.- Provide accurate and up-to-date infor: - Koresha amakuru y'ukuri kandi adacyuye igihe mu gihe ugaragaza  umwirondoro wawe kuri 250Ride.
translation.- Keep vehicles clean and well-maintain: - Ita ku isuku n'ubizirangenge bw'ibinyabiziga igihe cyose kugira ngo ingendo zikozwe muri ibyo binyabiziga zirusheho kunyura abazikora.
translation.- Drivers, ensure your vehicle complies: - Ku batwara abagenzi, menya neza ko ikinyabiziga cyawe cyujuje ibisabwa n'amategeko kugira ngo gikoreshe umuhanda.
translation.- Honor your commitments and try to avo: - Ba inyangamugayo yubahiriza ibyo yiyemeje wirinde bishoboka guhindura gahunda uhuriyeho n'abandi ku umunota wa nyuma.
translation.- Follow the cancellation policy outlin: - Ubahiriza ibivugwa muri aya Mategeko n'Amabwiria ku byerekeranye no guhagarika no guhindura gahunda y'urugendo rwateganyijwe
translation.- Provide honest and constructive feedb: - Tanga ibitekerezo by'ukuri kuri serivisi wahawe buri uko urangije urugendo.
translation.- Report any concerns, uncomfortable si: - Wifashishije ikoranabuhanga ry'itumanaho riboneka muri 250Ride tumenyeshe ku gihe impungenge iyariyo yose, ibitakunogeye, cyangwa se kurenga ku mabwiriza n'amategeko bikozwe ku rugendo ruteganyijwe, ruri kuba cyangwa se rurangiye.
translation.- Both riders and drivers are responsib: - Abagenzi n'abatwara abagenzi bose basabwe kubahiriza amategeko.
translation.By consolidating the community guideline: Gutangaza amabwiriza agenga imyitwarire myiza mu ngingo ya '2.3 Imyitwarire y'ukoresha serivisi' igize i ngingo '2. Gukoresha Serivisi' y'aya Mategeko n'Amabwiriza biha abakoresha serivisi zacu uburyo bwo kumenya no kumva inshingano zabo mu gihe bategura kandi bakora ingendo.
translation.3. Termination or Suspension of User Acc: 3. Guhagarika cyangwa se gufunga konti y'ukoresha serivisi
translation.3.1 Criteria for Termination or Suspensi: 3.1 Impamvu  zitera ihagarikwa cyangwa se ifungwa rya konti:
translation.We reserve the right to terminate or sus: Dufite uburenganzira bwo guhagarika cyangwa gufunga burundu konti z'abakoresha serivisi zacu kubw'impamvu zitandukanye, harimo n'izikurikira:
translation.- Any behavior that poses a threat to t: - Imyitwarire iyo ari yo yose ibangamiye umutekano n'imikorere myiza y'abakoresha serivisi zacu cyangwa se ibangamiye imbuga zacu.
translation.- Non-compliance with aforementioned co: - Kutubahiriza amabwiriza agenga imyitwarire myiza yavuzwe mu ngingo zibanza.
translation.Prior to the termination or suspension o: Mbere yo guhagarika cyangwa gufunga konti burundu, dushobora gukora isuzuma kugirango tumenye neza ko koko amakosa yadutangarijwe yabayeho. Igihe bishoboka, abakoresha serivisi zacu bahabwa ubutumwa bubamenyesha ko bari gukorwaho isuzumwa, kandi bahabwa amahirwe yo gukemura ibibazo byagaragajwe.
translation.If an account is suspended or terminated: Mu gihe konti zihagaritswe cyangwa se zifunzwe burundu, abazikoresha bagizweho ingaruka n'ibyo bikorwa bahabwa uburenganzira bwo kujuririra ibyemezo byafashwe. Amakuru y'uburyo bwo kujurira, harimo n'uburyo bwo gutanga ubujurire, ahabwa abayakeneye mu bakoresha serivisi zacu bagizweho ingaruka n'ibyemezo byafashwe.
translation.Upon termination or suspension of an acc: Mu gihe konti zihagaritswe cyangwa se zifunzwe burundu, abazikoresha batakaza uburyo bwose bwatuma bakoresha serivisi zacu. Ibikorwa byose bitararangira, ubusabe bwo kuzigamirwa imyanya y'ingedo, gahunda z'ingendo ziteganyijwe, bigirwaho ingaruka n'icyemezo cyo guhagarika cg se gufungirwa burundu konti, kandi abakoresha serivisi zacu bahabwa amakuru y'uko babyitwaramo mu gihe nk'icyo.
translation.Users are responsible for their safety d: Abakoresha serivise zacu bafite inshingano yo kubungabunga umutekano wabo mu gihe cy'ingendo. Bagomba kugaragaza ubwitonzi, kubahiriza amategeko y'umuhanda, no gutangira igihe amakuru ku bibazo by'umutekano muke bahuye nabyo.
translation.- Ensure that your luggage complies wit: - Suzuma neza ko imizigo yawe yujuje ibisabwa n'amategeko n'amabwiriza byashyizweho n'inzego za Leta. Birabujijwe kwitwaza ibintu binyuranyije n'amategeko, ibintu ibishobora guteza akaga, cyangwa se ibintu bibujijwe n'amategeko.
translation.- Carry valid personal identification a: - Itwaze indangamuntu yemewe nkuko bisabwa n'amategeko y'u Rwanda.
translation.- Provide accurate and up-to-date infor: - Tanga amakuru y'ukuri kandi adacyuye igihe ku mwirondoro wawe uri kuri 250Ride.
translation.- Treat drivers and fellow passengers w: - Ibyo ukorana n'abagenzi bagenzi bawe ndetse n'abatwara abagenzi bikore mu bwubahane n'ubupfura
translation.- Refrain from any behavior that may ca: - Irinde imyitwarire iyo ari yo yose ishobora gutuma abandi babangamirwa cyangwa se bagira umutekano muke.
translation.- Report any safety concerns, uncomfort: - Tangira ku gihe amakuru ku bibazo byose byateza umutekano muke, ibintu bibangamye n'ibitameze neza, cyangwa se igihe amabwiriza amabwiriza agenga imyitwarire myiza yirengagijwe.
translation.- Use the in-app reporting feature to n: - Koresha uburyo bw'itumanaho buboneka muri serivisi zacu mu kutugezaho amakuru, haba mu gihe cy'urugendo, mbere yarwo cyangwa se nyuma yarwo.
translation.- Ensure your vehicle complies with Rwa: - Ikinyabiziga cyawe kigomba kuba cyujuje ibisabwa kugira ngo kijye mu muhanda nk'uko amategeko y'u Rwanda abiteganya, kandi gifite ibyangombwa byose bitegetswe.
translation.- Keep the car's emergency kit up-to-da: - Ikinyabiziga kigomba kuba gifite ibikoresho by'ibanze n'ibyo kwiyambaza nkenerwa, nk'uko biteganywa n'amategeko agenga ibinyabiziga.
translation.- Possess a valid and up-to-date driver: - Ugomba kuba ufite ibyangombwa bikwemerera gutwara ikinyabiziga utwaye nk'uko biteganywa n'amategeko y'u Rwanda.
translation.- Maintain a professional and courteous: - Gira ikinyabupfura n'ubunyamwuga mu gihe uha abagenzi serivisi.
translation.- Keep your vehicle clean and well-main: - Ita ku isuku n'ubizirangenge bw'ibinyabiziga igihe cyose kugira ngo ingendo zikozwe muri ibyo binyabiziga zirusheho kunyura abazikora.
translation.- Conduct periodic checks to ensure rid: - Buri gihe kora igenzura rigamije kureba ko abagenzi bubahirije amabwiriza agenga imizigo.
translation.- Politely inform riders of any violati: - Mu kinyabupfura, menyesha abagenzi igihe barenze ku Amategeko n'Amabwiriza kandi ubasabe kwikosora.
translation.- Report any rider behavior that raises: - Tanga amakuru igihe ubonye imyitwarire y'umugenzi iteza umutekano muke cyangwa irenga ku mabwiriza agenga imyitwarire myiza. Koresha uburyo bw'itumanaho buboneka muri serivisi zacu mu kutugezaho amakuru, haba mu gihe cy'urugendo, mbere yarwo cyangwa se nyuma yarwo.
translation.- In the event of an emergency, call lo: - Mugihe uhuye n'ikibazo cyihutirwa, hamagara serivisi z'ubutabazi bwihuse unamenyeshe inzego z'ubuyobozi zibishinzwe.
translation.- Both riders and drivers must comply wi: - Abagenzi n'abatwara abagenzi bose bagomba kubahiriza amategeko n'amabwiriza byashyizweho na Leta y'u Rwanda.
translation.Users must provide accurate and up-to-da: Abakoresha serivisi zacu bagomba gutanga amakuru y'ukuri kandi adacyuye igihe ku myirondoro yabo, harimo amakuru abaranga ndetse  n'amakuru ku binyabiziga byabo.
translation.4.3 Feedback and Ratings: 4.3 Gutanga ibitekerezo ndetse n' amanita ku migendekere y'urugendo
translation.Users are encouraged to provide honest f: Abakoresha serivisi zacu bashishikarijwe gutanga ibitekerezo n'amanota kuri serivisi bahawe n'abatwara abagenzi ndetse n'uko abagenzi bagenzi babo bitwaye mu rugendo.
translation.4.4 Ride Cancellations and No-Show Polic: Amabwiriza ku guhagarika urugendo no kwica gahunda y'urugendo
translation.In the event that the driver fails to ap: Mugihe utwara abagenzi watanze gahunda abuze kandi igihe cyo gutangira urugendo kigeze, umugenzi wishyuye urugendo asubizwa ubwishyu  bwe na 250 Ride. Utwara abagenzi wishe gahunda nawe yandikwaho umwenda agiriye 250 Ride ungana n'ikiguzi cya serivisi y'ikoranabuhanga yifashishijwe kugira ngo umugenzi wiciwe gahunda yishyurwe byuzuye.
translation.If a rider fails to appear at the depart: Mugihe umugenzi watanze gahunda abuze kandi igihe cyo gutangira urugendo kigeze, ubwishyu bw'urugendo yakoze ntibusubizwa, ubwo bwishyu buhabwa utwara abagenzi wagombaga ku mutwara, bukamugezwaho iyo igihe cyagombaga kurangirizwaho urugendo kigeze.
translation.Cancellation reimbursements and transact: Mu gihe habayeho guhagarika urugendo, ibikorwa byo gusubizwa ubwishyu bwabayeho no kwandikwaho umwenda wa serivisi z'ikoranabuhanga ryo kwishyurana bigenwa ku buryo bukurikira:
translation.- Cancellations initiated by either the: - Ihagarikwa rikozwe n'umugenzi cyangwa se utwara abagenzi, bigakorerwa uko byagenwe ku mbuga zacu mu minota 40 mbere y'igihe cy'itangira ry'urugendo, ubwishyu bwabayeho burasubizwa ariko ikiguzi cya serivisi z'ikoranabuhanga ryo kwishyurana kigatangwa aho biri ngombwa.
translation.- If the cancellation is carried out by: - Mu gihe ihagarikwa ryakozwe n'utwara abagenzi, yaba umugenzi cyangwa utwara abagenzi ntibakwa ikiguzi cya serivisi z'ikoranabuhanga ryo kwishyurana. Mugihe ihagarikwa ryakozwe n'umugenzi, 250 Ride imusubiza ubwishyu yakoze ariko agatanga amafaranga ahwanye n'ikiguzi cya serivisi z'ikoranabuhanga ryo kwishyurana
translation.- Cancellations initiated by either the: - Ihagarikwa rikozwe n'umugenzi cyangwa se utwara abagenzi, bigakorerwa uko byagenwe ku mbuga zacu amasaha 2 mbere y'igihe cy'itangira ry'urugendo, ubwishyu bwabayeho burasubizwa ariko ikiguzi cya serivisi z'ikoranabuhanga ryo kwishyurana kigatangwa aho biri ngombwa.
translation.- If the cancellation is carried out by: - Mu gihe ihagarikwa ryakozwe n'utwara abagenzi, yaba umugenzi cyangwa utwara abagenzi ntibakwa ikiguzi cya serivisi z'ikoranabuhanga ryo kwishyurana.
translation.- In the event of rider-initiated cance: - Mugihe ihagarikwa ryakozwe n'umugenzi, 250 Ride imusubiza ubwishyu yakoze ariko agatanga amafaranga ahwanye n'ikiguzi cya serivisi z'ikoranabuhanga ryo kwishyurana
translation.Our Privacy Policy governs the collectio: Politiki y'Ibanga yacu igenga ikusanya, ikoreshwa, n'itangazwa ry'amakuru bwite. Gukoresha serivisi zacu bisobanuye kwemera ingingo zikubiye muri Politiki y'Ibanga yacu.
translation.6.1 Intellectual Property Rights: 6.1 Uburenganzira ku mutungo bwite mu by'ubwenge:
translation.All intellectual property rights associa: Uburenganzira ku mutungo bwite w'ubwenge bwose burebana n'imbuga zacu, harimo ibimenyetso, ibirango, inyandiko n'amakuru, ni ubwa 250 RIDE Ltd.
translation.Users are granted a limited, non-exclusi: Abakoresha serivisi zacu bahabwa uburenganzira budasesuye, butihariye, budahererekanwa bwo gusura no gukoresha imbuga zacu hagamijwe gutwarwa cyangwa se gutwara abagenzi mu buryo bwo gusaranganya imyanya y'imodoka. Abakoresha serivisi zacu ntibagomba kwigana, guhindura, gukwirakwiza, cyangwa guhanga bafatiye ku bigize imbuga na apulikasiyo zacu mu gihe batabiherewe uruhushya mu buryo bweruye.
translation.We reserve the right to terminate or sus: Dufite uburenganzira bwo guhagarika cyangwa se gufunga burundu konti z'abakoresha serivisi zacu mu gihe batubahirije aya Amategeko n'Amabwiriza, igihe bakoze ibikorwa bitemewe, igihe bagize imyitwarire iyo ari yo yose ibangamiye umutekano n'imikorere myiza y'abakoresha serivisi zacu cyangwa se ibangamiye imbuga zacu.
translation.We may update these Terms and Conditions: Tuzajya tuvugurura aya Amategeko n'Amabwiriza buri nyuma y'igihe runaka. Abakoresha serivisi zacu bamenyeshwa impinduka zose zikomeye ziyakozweho. Abakoresha serivisi zacu  bashishikarijwe guhora bareba ko nta mpinduka zakozwe kuri aya Amategeko n'Amabwiriza.
translation.8.2 Encourage Regular Review: 8.2 Kugushikariza guhora usoma aya Amategeko n'Amabwiriza:
translation.Users are responsible for periodically r: Abakoresha serivisi zacu bafite inshingano zo guhora basoma buri gihe Amategeko n'Amabwiriza, ndetse no mu gihe batamenyeshejwe ko yakozweho impinduka. Gukomeza gukoresha serivisi zacu bisobanuye kwemera impinduka zose zakozwe ku Amategeko n'Amabwiriza.
translation.The carpooling platform does not guarant: Ntabwo tukwijeje ko uzabona ingendo cyangwa se abagenzi ku mbuga zacu, kandi serivisi dutanga zishobora kutaboneka cyangwa se zigahinduka.
translation.If you have any questions or concerns re: Niba mufite ikibazo cyangwa impungenge kuri aya Amategeko n'Amabwiriza mutwandikire kuri info@250ride.rw. Murakoze guhitamo 250Ride.
translation.Thank you for choosing 250Ride. We appre: Tubashimiye uruhare rwanyu mu gutuma serivisi zacu zo gusaranganya imyanya y'imodoka z'urugendo zinogera buri wese.
